/usr/local/mpich-3.4.1/bin/mpicc -fPIC -g -shared -Wl,-soname,libstencil.so -o libstencil.so CMakeFiles/stencil.dir/stencil/config.c.o CMakeFiles/stencil.dir/stencil/comm_handler.c.o CMakeFiles/stencil.dir/stencil/mesh.c.o CMakeFiles/stencil.dir/stencil/init.c.o CMakeFiles/stencil.dir/stencil/solve.c.o  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/mpich-3.4.1/lib /usr/local/mpich-3.4.1/lib/libmpi.so -lm
